features: Long Handle Broom and Dust Pan: heavy duty broom and dust pan set is made from stainless steel, lightweight and sturdy, durable and easy to assemble, it can be applied as a kitchen, home, office or lobby broom and dust pan combo for quick and easy cleaning

Adjustable Design for Comfort: the brooms have 4 poles design and dustpans have 2 poles design, so you can choose the length of the broom and dust pan according to the height of the child or adult; Makes you more comfortable and sweeps the floor without bending over

Package Inclusion: each package of our standing outdoor dustpan and broom set includes 2 brooms and 2 dustpans; Five row stiff bristles are thicker and longer and support indoor and outdoor use in multiple scenes

Space Saving buckle Design: our cleverly designed stand up broom and dustpan set is very mindful of your storage space; Both pieces are easily hung, keeping them readily available while maximizing your storage area, you can also use the buckle on the dustpan to attach them together; No need for large storage bins or cabinets, this set is all about convenience

Proper Size for Effective Cleaning: the standing brooms for sweeping indoor, with measurements about 12 x 45 inches, and the dustpan, approximately 10 x 31 inches, are both adequately sized for efficient cleaning; This ensures that you can sweep and collect dust in all corners of your home without straining
body.description: Features: The standing household brooms in this set boasts a larger brush head than the dustpan, ensuring a wider sweep area. Its tight bristles ensure efficient cleaning, making every sweep count. Our standing outdoor broom and dustpan set come in sophisticated shades of silver and brown. These colors naturally blend with different room interiors, giving your cleaning tools a stylish look besides their primary function. Specifications: Material: stainless steel, plastic Color: silver, brown Size: Broom: about 12 x 45 inches/ 31 x 115 cm Dustpan: about 10 x 31 inches/ 26 x 79 cm Package includes: 2 x Standing broom 2 x Standing dustpan Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They are just OK.
reviews.reviewText: I really was hoping that I would be completely satisfied with this broom set and pan but the problem with it is are the handles are made very cheaply. They are very flimsy and cheap. Everything else is pretty good on it but the handles is what I am not happy with. I would overall not recommend this set.
